item.title: 10 diff skins changer
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

bullzeye95:

Rtfm? What does that mean? And also ftw?

Urbandictionary.com, go there everytime you see a term you don’t know about. They have EVERYTHING(and more). According to it, rtfm = Read the fucking manual.

item.title: 10 diff skins changer
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

<center>

<form>
<select onChange="changeskin(this.options[this.selectedIndex].value); window.location.reload();">
<option>Change Skin
<option>
<option value="Abstract-Black"> Abstract-Black
<option value="BattleTronix"> BattleTronix
<option value="BlackTech"> BlackTech
<option value="BlueIllusion"> BlueIllusion
<option value="BlueTyphoon"> BlueTyphoon
<option value="BxBlue"> BxBlue
<option value="Code:AlphaGray"> Code:AlphaGray
<option value="CutBlue"> CutBlue
<option value="DarkAqua"> DarkAqua
<option value="DarkInferno"> DarkInferno
<option value="EternalDark"> EternalDark
<option value="Evatorium"> Evatorium
<option value="Exploderien"> Exploderien
<option value="Extinuise"> Extinuise
</select>
</form>



<script language="JavaScript">
<!--

/*
Change Skin Script
Copyright Â© 2003 xMALEVOLENCEx
*/

var scheme = getCookie('template1');
if (scheme == 'Abstract-Black') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/abstrablack.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'BattleTronix') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/Battletronix.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'BlackTech') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/blacktech.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'BlueIllusion') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/Blueillusion.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'BlueTyphoon') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/BlueTyphoon.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'BxBlue') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/BxBlue.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'Code:AlphaGray') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/codealphagray.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'CutBlue') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/cutblue.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'DarkAqua') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/darkaqua.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'DarkInferno') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/Darkinferno.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'EternalDark') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/Eternaldark.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'Evatorium') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/Evatorium.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'Exploderien') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/Exploderien.css">');
} else if (scheme == 'Extinuise') {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://h1.ripway.com/DrRage/Extinuise.css">');
} else {
document.write('<LINK REL="stylesheet" TYPE="text/css" HREF="http://">');
}


function changeskin(change) {
var scheme = change;
var name = 'template1';
var pathname = location.pathname;
var myDomain = pathname.substring(0,pathname.lastIndexOf('/')) +'/';
var ExpDate = new Date ();
ExpDate.setTime(ExpDate.getTime() + (180 * 24 * 3600 * 1000));
setCookie(name,scheme,ExpDate,myDomain);
}
function getCookie(name){
var cname = name + "=";
var dc = document.cookie;
if (dc.length > 0) {
begin = dc.indexOf(cname);
if (begin != -1) {
begin += cname.length;
end = dc.indexOf(";", begin);
if (end == -1) end = dc.length;
return unescape(dc.substring(begin, end));
}
}
return null;
}

function setCookie(name, value, expires, path, domain, secure) {
document.cookie = name + "=" + escape(value) +
((expires == null) ? "" : "; expires=" + expires.toGMTString()) +
((path == null) ? "" : "; path=" + path) +
((domain == null) ? "" : "; domain=" + domain) +
((secure == null) ? "" : "; secure");
}
-->
</script></center>

thanks to my buddy rage aka shadowkin for creatin

Read full topic
